name: Extreme Roomba Annihilation XL
description:
This is a Game Jam entry for : Wowie Jam 4.0

The planet has been destroyed by crabs, and the roombas need your help to destroy the crabs in return!

The game is slightly overtuned, feel free to lower the difficulty in settings.

If you are a strong gamer this is not an issue on default settings.

(Game breaking?) Bugs :

Changing difficulty mid game will not affect when the boss enters the map.

Theme : Collaborate with AI

i'm aware Roombas aren't exactly AI.

Controls : 

WASD, Space ; moving + jumping

Left Mouse to activate Buttons and throw roombas.

Sidenotes : Didn't have time for audio polish and better death effects.  found some sounds in some asset packs i had from humble bundle. The music is disabled by default you can enable it in the settings, but just put on a banger track and pretend its the soundtrack. also just imagine it's cooler when the crabs fall over.

It is what it is.
